ratings.comment: I have taken Victor for two classes in a row. It is rare that you will find a professor who cares so much about you! His classes usually run a bit short and you'll do a lot of group work but you have time in class and present it. He is smart and even communicates via Slack and has a pet channel and makes class more enjoyable! Def take him if u can!
I had Victor as a TA for Marketing 300 and would highly recommend him as a teacher. Engaging, smart, willing to help, and a fair grader. Made the required class easier to bear.

Victor is a great professor for this class.He explains topics in plain English and doesn't get caught up in detailed statistics.Quizzes every class add up for 30% of your grade, but this is in place of a final exam!(the quizzes are NOT hard)Most work consists of group projects.He is very willing to help if asked!I would definitely recommend Victor.
